items.sentence: At least thirty people were killed in the violence.
At least thirty people were injured in the bombing.
Tom got up early to make pancakes for his children.
I think you look a lot better without a beard, Tom.
Tom often pours maple syrup on pancakes or waffles.
I'm still not sure that I understand what you mean.
I hope that Tom understands what we want him to do.
I hope Tom finds the courage to do the right thing.
One of my daughters goes to the same school as Tom.
We could hear people talking in the adjoining room.
